value.halfverse: ascribe to the LORD glory and strength.
value.verse: Ascribe to the LORD, you gods, *
Ascribe to the LORD the glory due his Name; *
value.halfverse: worship the LORD in the beauty of holiness.

value.verse:
The voice of the LORD is upon the waters;
the God of glory thunders; *
value.halfverse: the LORD is upon the mighty waters.

value.verse: The voice of the LORD is a powerful voice; *
value.halfverse: the voice of the LORD is a voice of splendor.
the LORD breaks the cedars of Lebanon;
value.verse: The voice of the LORD breaks the cedar trees; *
He makes Lebanon skip like a calf, *
value.halfverse: and Mount Hermon like a young wild ox.
the LORD shakes the wilderness of Kadesh.
value.verse:
The voice of the LORD splits the flames of fire;
the voice of the LORD shakes the wilderness; *
The voice of the LORD makes the oak trees writhe *
And in the temple of the LORD *
The LORD sits enthroned above the flood; *
value.halfverse: the LORD sits enthroned as King for evermore.
the LORD shall give his people the blessing of peace.
value.verse: The LORD shall give strength to his people; *
